stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, take 1 bad publicity. When your action phase ends, if you scored this agenda this turn, remove all tags, then give the Runner 3 tags.
text:
When this agenda is scored or stolen, take 1 bad publicity.
When your action phase ends, if you scored this agenda this turn, remove all tags, then give the Runner 3 tags.
title: Witch Hunt
